sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Making fiscal year column on Project Funding table not read only to support write for new Record through ACL.</description>
        <name>Allow Write Project funding Fiscal Year </name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var upd = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
upd.addQuery('name', 'project_funding');
upd.addQuery('element', 'fiscal_period');
upd.query();
if (upd.next()) {
    if (upd.getValue('read_only') == true) {
        upd.setValue('read_only', false);
        upd.update();
        gs.log("Updated project funding Fiscal year to not read only");

    } else
        gs.log("Not Updated project funding Fiscal year as it is already not read only");
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-12-10 03:01:54</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3b39934e77500110ff9b398e5b5a9918</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Allow Write Project funding Fiscal Year </sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="PPM Standard" source="com.snc.financial_planning_pmo">92ef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3b39934e77500110ff9b398e5b5a9918</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-12-10 03:01:54</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Allow Write Project funding Fiscal Year
